name: Salvage Racer (GMTK 2021 - Unfinished)
description:
Developed roughly 24 hours for the GMTK game jam. In this game you drive along a track, avoiding obstacles while trying to crash the other green cars to use their parts for a new ability. Get the slide and spin to crash through the yellow barrels for more points, and use the jump to avoid the walls.

Controls: Move with WASD, use abilities with J, K, & SPACE once you've collected them. ESCAPE closes the game.

Be aware: This game was not able to be finished in time, so it barely works. You can get a general sense of the gameplay I was going for, but that's about it.
